text: had a great experience getting vaccinated for flu in this clinic. doctor and nurses were very friendly even though it was 9.30pm at night and my partner and i were the last visitor. doctor trin was very friendly and greeted us warmly when we entered the room. he was super professional in administering the vaccination, ensures that my vaccination records were correct and briefed the details on the vaccine and precautions to take. we even had wholesome small talk and it was a pleasant chat despite it being so short! 100% recommend this clinic!

It was my first time and I was in awe of how seamless the whole process was. From making appointment online to seeing the doctor. No need to fill up forms which I hate. The nurse was very patient and nice.

I saw Dr Dinesh and I totally in love how detailed he was. He listened to me attentively when I described my symptoms. Some docs would multi task while listening to you but Dr Dinesh stopped what he was doing and just listened to you, always making eye contact. He gave very good suggestions and recommendations. He was also very assuring!

I would go back to him again when I am sick. He has been such a nice doctor to talk to.

I had an excellent experience with Dr. Trin, Dr Dinesh and their team. From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming and professional. Doctor took the time to listen to my concerns, explain everything clearly, and provide thoughtful care. Their expertise and compassionate approach made me feel comfortable and confident in my treatment. I highly recommend Finest Health Medical Centre to anyone looking for a knowledgeable and caring healthcare provider!

I had a wonderful visit to Finest Health Medical Centre for my [issue. The care I received from doctor & staffs was exceptional. They listened attentively to my concerns and provided personalized treatment that yielded positive results. The entire team at the clinic displayed a high level of professionalism and made me feel comfortable throughout my visit. I highly endorse Finest Health Medical Center for their excellent service and expertise.

my experience at finest health has been nothing but exceptional.. i really appreciate the doctors who work there, they always take the time to have a chat during the consultation itself - and this makes me feel welcomed and valued. thank you! the nurses in the clinic also showed great compassion, and actively welcomed me, making me feel seen and comfortable while at the clinic. thank you! ðŸ˜ŠðŸ’ž
